summary.para: Contains values corresponding to strings that can be localized.

Represents the text of the Cancel button, which may appear in any DXPrinting dialog.
Default value: "Cancel"

Represents the pattern used to format the current and total page values in the status bar, shown at the bottom of the Print Preview window.
Default value: "Page {0} of {1}"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button that decreases the current zoom value.
Default value: "Zoom Out"

Represents the description used for a print job, by default.
Default value: "Document"

Represents the title of the Error message box in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Error"

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Export Document... drop-down button and exports the current document to CSV.
Default value: "CSV File"

Represents the tooltip text for the drop-down toolbar button, which provides the capability to export a document to one of the available export formats.
Default value: "Export Document..."

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Export Document... drop-down button and exports the current document to HTML.
Default value: "HTML File"

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Export Document... drop-down button, and exports the current document to an image file.
Default value: "Image File"

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Export Document... drop-down button and exports the current document to MHT.
Default value: "MHT File"

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Export Document... drop-down button and exports the current document to PDF.
Default value: "PDF File"

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Export Document... drop-down button and exports the current document to RTF.
Default value: "RTF File"

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Export Document... drop-down button and exports the current document to Text.
Default value: "Text File"

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Export Document... drop-down button and exports the current document to XLS.
Default value: "XLS File"

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Export Document... drop-down button and exports the current document to XLSX.
Default value: "XLSX File"

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Export Document... drop-down button and exports the current document to XPS.
Default value: "XPS File"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which moves Print Preview to the first page of the document.
Default value: "First Page"

Represents the text before the editor, which shows the current page number in the status bar of the Print Preview window.
Default value: "Page:"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which increases the current zoom value.
Default value: "Zoom In"

Represents the title of the dialog shown when a report is expired.
Default value: "Information"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which moves Print Preview to the last page of the document.
Default value: "Last Page"

Represents the caption of all message boxes that can be invoked by the DXPrinting library at runtime.
Default value: "DXPrinting"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which moves Print Preview to the next page of the document.
Default value: "Next Page"

Represents the text of the OK button, which may appear in any DXPrinting dialog.
Default value: "OK"

Represents the text of the tooltip shown for the Open button in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Open"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which invokes the Page Setup dialog for the current document.
Default value: "Page Setup..."

Represents the description of the specified measurement uint in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Inches"

Represents the text of the bottom margin field's caption in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Bottom:"

Represents the text of the page margins section caption in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Margins in {0}"

Represents the text of the left margin field's caption in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Left:"

Represents the text of the right margin field's caption in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Right:"

Represents the text of the top margin field's caption in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Top:"

Represents the description of the specified measurement uint in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Millimeters"

Represents the caption of the text orientation radio group in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Orientation:"

Represents the caption of the radio button corresponding to the landscape page orientation, in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Landscape"

Represents the caption of the radio button corresponding to the portrait page orientation, in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Portrait"

Represents the text of the paper settings group's caption in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Paper"

Represents the caption of the paper size drop-down selector in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Paper size:"

Represents the caption of the printer drop-down selector in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Printer:"

Represents the text of the printer settings group's caption in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Printer"

Represents the text of the printer comment caption in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Comment:"

Represents the text of the printer port caption in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Port:"

Represents the text of the printer type caption in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Type:"

Represents the title of the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Page Setup"

Represents the caption of the Changing Permissions group in the PDF Password Security dialog.
Default value: "Changes allowed:"

Represents the text of the PDF Password Security dialog's option, which enables the copying of text, images and other content in the resulting PDF document.
Default value: "Enable copying of text, images and other content"

Represents the text of the PDF Password Security dialog's option, which enables text access for screen reader devices for the resulting PDF document.
Default value: "Enable text access for screen reader devices for the visually impaired"

Represents the caption of the Open Password edit box in the PDF Password Security dialog.
Default value: "Document open password:"

Represents the caption of the Change Permissions Password edit box in the PDF Password Security dialog.
Default value: "Change permissions password:"

Represents the text of the PDF Password Security dialog's option, which enables/disables printing the resulting PDF document.
Default value: "Printing allowed:"

Represents the text of the PDF Password Security dialog's option, which enables the password requirement to open a document.
Default value: "Require a password to open the document"

Represents the text of the PDF Password Security dialog's option, which enables restricting editing and printing of the document.
Default value: "Restrict editing and printing of the document"

Represents the title of the PDF Password Security dialog.
Default value: "PDF Password Security"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which moves Print Preview to the previous page of the document.
Default value: "Previous Page"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which invokes the Print dialog for the current document.
Default value: "Print..."

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which prints the document preview directly, without any dialogs.
Default value: "Quick Print"

Represents the caption of the Print Preview window.
Default value: "Print Preview"

Represents the text of the Refresh toolbar button in the dialog shown when a report is expired.
Default value: "Refresh"

Represents the text of the warning that appears if the confirmation password doesn't match.
Default value: "Confirmation password does not match. Please start over and enter the password again."

Represents the caption of the Open Password edit box in the Confirm Document Open Password dialog.
Default value: "Document open password:"

Represents the text of the note in the Confirm Document Open Password dialog.
Default value: "Please confirm the Document Open Password. Be sure to make a note of the password. It will be required to open the document."

Default value: "Confirm Document Open Password"

Default value: "_Permissions password:"

Default value: "Confirm Permissions Password"

Represents the text of the tooltip shown for the Save button in the Page Setup dialog.
Default value: "Save"

Represents the caption of the drop-down item, which is present in the Send via e-mail... drop-down button and exports the current document to CSV.
Default value: "CSV File"

Represents the tooltip text for the drop-down toolbar button, which provides the capability to export a document to one of the available export formats and send it via e-mail.

Default value: "XLSX File"

Default value: "XPS File"

Represents the text of the error message that informs the user that the server timeout is expired.
Default value: "The report is expired. Please click the 'Refresh' toolbar button to generate a report again."

Represents the caption of the status bar, shown at the bottom of the Print Preview window.
Default value: "Status Bar"

Represents the caption of the button displayed in the status bar that interrupts document creation.
Default value: "Stop"

Represents the caption of the toolbar, which contains Print Preview buttons.
Default value: "Print Preview"

Represents the pattern used to format the current Zoom value in the status bar, shown at the bottom of the Print Preview window.
Default value: "Zoom: {0:0}%"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which zooms a document in or out as appropriate, so that the height of the current page fits the preview window.
Default value: "Page Height"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which zooms a document in or out as appropriate, so that the width of the current page fits the preview window.
Default value: "Page Width"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which zooms a document in or out as appropriate, so that only two full pages of the document are shown in the preview.
Default value: "Two Pages"

Represents the tooltip text for the toolbar button, which zooms a document in or out as appropriate, so that the current page fits the preview window.
Default value: "Whole Page"

Represents the display format of the zoom ratio drop-down selector in Print Preview.
Default value: "{0}%"
Specifies the order in which visual data nodes are printed on a page.
Data nodes are printed horizontally, then vertically (in rows).
Data nodes are printed vertically, then horizontally (in columns).
Represents the base class for all printing links within the DXPrinting library.
